body_html: if you are using a python model use tf.image.resize_image_with_crop_or_pad to resize image or tf.reshape(tensor, shape, name=None) to change dimensions and then call this function from c++
body_text: if you are using a python model use  tf.image.resize_image_with_crop_or_pad to resize image or tf.reshape(tensor, shape, name=None) to change dimensions and then call this function from c++
body: if you are using a python model use  tf.image.resize_image_with_crop_or_pad to resize image or [tf.reshape(tensor, shape, name=None)](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.3/api_docs/python/tf/reshape) to change dimensions and then call this function from c++
